title: (x) Can someone identify this font from FarmVille game? - Merkin {Mike F}
content:
Hey everyone, I'm new, just wanted to say hi first :).

So.. I'm in love with this font they use on the FarmVille game and I can't identify it, I guess this is the best place to ask for help.

Thanks alot!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [fvfont.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20100426012702/http:/typophile.com/files/fvfont.png) | 2.97 KB |
author: c00kie

comments.content:
Welcome Ali. The Farmville font doesn't look familiar. It's possible they designed (or modified) their own font for the web game.

- Mike Yanega
Wow, great job Mike F! Thanks!!
